description.value: During his third year at Hogwarts School for Witchcraft and Wizardry, Harry Potter must confront the devious and dangerous wizard responsible for his parents' deaths.

table_of_contents.title: Owl post -- Aunt Marge's big mistake -- The Knight bus -- The Leaky Cauldron -- Talons and tea leaves -- The boggart in the wardrobe -- Flight of the fat lady -- Grim defeat -- The marauder's map -- The Firebolt -- The Patronus -- Gryffindor versus Ravenclaw -- Snape's grudge -- The quidditch final -- Professor Trelawney's prediction -- Cat, rat, and dog -- Moony, Wormtail, Padfoot, and Prongs -- The servant of Lord Voldemort -- The dementor's kiss -- Hermione's secret -- Owl post again.
